text.22_Tetzaveh, 48_Paragraph, 0_Paragraph: It is written (Exodus 34:17), "You must not make molten gods for yourselves": And it is written after it (Exodus 34:18), "You shall observe the Feast of Matzot." [The Zohar] asks, "Why is this next to this?" And it answers, "Rather, this is why He positioned it [so] - one who eats chametz is like one who worships idolatry.
